Uses of Class
inra.ijpb.data.Cursor3D

  • Packages that use Cursor3D 
    Package Description
    inra.ijpb.data
    Some utility classes for accessing image data.
    inra.ijpb.data.image
    Some classes to access image data in a unified and hopefully efficient way.
    inra.ijpb.label
    Utility methods for label images (stored as 8-, 16- or 32-bits).

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Cursor3D[] LabelValues.findPositionOfMaxValues(ij.ImageStack valueImage, ij.ImageStack labelImage, int[] labels)
      For each label, finds the position of the point belonging to label region defined by labelImage and with maximal value in intensity image valueImage.
      static Cursor3D[] LabelValues.findPositionOfMinValues(ij.ImageStack valueImage, ij.ImageStack labelImage, int[] labels)
